name: Strawberry Poppy Seed Salad With Grilled Chicken Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: olive oil, nonfat greek yogurt, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, honey, poppy seed, dijon mustard, salt, ground black pepper, boneless, skinless chicken breast, salt, ground black pepper, paprika, olive oil, baby spinach, strawberry, avocado, sliced almond
recipeIngredient: 1 boneless, skinless chicken breast, sliced into ½-inch pieces
½ cup strawberries, hulled and sliced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a bowl, add the olive oil, Greek yogurt, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, honey, poppy seeds, mustard, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and whisk until emulsified.
Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and paprika.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 4 minutes per side.
Once cooled, slice the chicken on a cutting board.
Toss spinach, strawberries, avocado, almonds, and sliced chicken together in a large bowl and drizzle with poppy seed dressing.
